title: Warring Kingdoms Tryndamere
body: Text overflow of "Warring Kingdoms Tryndamere" on loading screen for the match. It goes outside the bounds of the champion card.

replies.body:
Hey AMDABEST! 

In some cases, the names will spill over a bit; Alien Invader Heimerdinger, for example. ;-; It's something that's on the back burner for now, since we have some core features we're prioritizing with the new client. :)
no simple card can contain my fury
